TITLE: Episode 40 - Red Pill of the Week: Operation Showtime
DESCRIPTION: In part two of a three part Red Pill of the Week, we take a look at Operation Showtime and recount the story of the ATF's failed raid on David Koresh and the Branch Davidian's at their home, Mt. Carmel. This is what happens when you stand up to the federal government and their militarized police forces. And it only gets worse from here.
